# se-radio-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                           | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Optional property that defines if the switch is disabled.  Set to `false` by default. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event    | Description                                                                           | Type                |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `change` | Send the state of the switch (true/false) to the parent component when it is toggled. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
